title: Roast goose breast with figs, fried potatoes and winter greens
description: Roast goose and fig is a wonderful combination. Perfect for a festive supper with friends.
ingredients: 70g/2½oz raisins, soaked in warm water for 15 minutes, then drained
300g/10½oz winter greens (mix of cavolo nero, turnip tops or savoy cabbage), trimmed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
